text: Fawn, also known as moderate orange yellow, is a yellowish light brown color. The first use of fawn as a color name, in English, was in the year 1789. == Color codes == * In hex: #E5AA70 * HSV: (30Â°, 51%, 90%) * RGB: (229, 170, 112) == Related pages == * Brown * Caramel * Orange * Yellow
title: Fawn (colour)
